Name: Platform Roll
About the game: About PlatformRoll is a side scroller game with challenging obstacles including bombs, bomb guns and gaps through platforms. You have to maneuver the ball across all the platforms in the dark with only a little light in order to reach the next level. Compete against an online leaderboard and see how fast you can complete each level. How To Play Key A / Left Arrow - Move left. Key D / Right Arrow - Move right. Key W / Space / Up Arrow - Jump. Key R - Restart game. ESC - Open & close pause menu. TAB - Open & close leaderboard. Note Invisible trigger boxes, bombs, bomb guns or obstacles that push you of the platform will respawn you at a checkpoint. If you fall in the water it's an automatic restart at the starting point and NOT at the checkpoint. Features 20 levels with more to come in future upgrades. Steam Leaderboards to compete with the world. Steam Achievements. Collect gold pickups for future ball skins.
